snippet: President Obama has traveled to New York around 20 times during his first term, but he is not collecting money from Wall Street the way he used to, Nicholas Confessore reports in The Money Issue of The New York Times Magazine.
abstract: President Obama has traveled to New York around 20 times during his first term, but he is not collecting money from Wall Street the way he used to, Nicholas Confessore reports in The Money Issue of The New York Times Magazine.

headline.main: Obama's Not-So-Hot Date With Wall Street
